package.name: jekyll-yaml
package.author: mathis
package.description: A simple package to add metadata to your jekyll posts before writing.
package.title: Jekyll YAML metadata

manifest.name: jekyll-yaml
manifest.title: Jekyll YAML metadata
manifest.description: A simple package to add metadata to your jekyll posts before writing.
manifest.author: mathis

packageRepo.readme:
This package lets you add some yaml-metadata to a jekyll post.

Typing `:newpost` yields the following:

```
---
date: 2024-12-05
author: YourName
tags:
category:
title:
---
```

Date is set to the current date and authorname can obviously be adjusted.

Change the value `YourName` in line 5 of this package's `package.yml`.

Please make sure to add tags like the following and remain consistent:

```
author: 
tags:
	- tag1
	- tag2
category:
```

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
global_vars:      
  - name: autorname
    type: echo
    params: 
      echo: YourName
matches:
  - trigger: ":newpost"
    replace: "---\ndate: {{mydate}}\nauthor: {{autorname}}\ntags:\ncategory:\ntitle:\n---"
    vars:
      - name: mydate
        type: date
        params:
          format: "%Y-%m-%d"
